attributes.action: Stop giving homework to primary and secondary school students
attributes.additional_details: Finland have some of the happiest and most academically successful students in the world. Finland also have almost no homework.
attributes.background: I think that the government should ban all homework for children aged 4-16. This is because children go to school for an average of 6.5 hours a day and then get home and have to do more work, this being homework.
